stepAnswer: End behavior: f(x)≈x as x→±∞, Local behavior: Vertical asymptote at $$x=-1$$
stepTitle: Analyze the local and end behavior of the given function
answerLatex: End behavior: f(x)≈x as x→±∞, Local behavior: Vertical asymptote at $$x=-1$$
choices: End behavior: f(x)≈x+1 as x→±∞, Local behavior: Vertical asymptote at $$x=1$$
End behavior: f(x)≈x as x→±∞, Local behavior: Vertical asymptote at $$x=-1$$
End behavior: $$f(x)≈-1$$ as x→±∞, Local behavior: Vertical asymptote at $$x=-1$$
